text: yahapath saukhya purudu ha aaharawala poshana gunayan pilibanda danuwath kirima ha yahapath saukhya puruduhurukarawima magin poshana mattama ihala nanwima sidu kereyi.gruha aarthika eekakayan yanu pawul eekakaya thula dainika aahara purudu ha paribhojana ratawe wenaskam athi kirima, emagin samastha janagahanaye nirogi pawathmata ha poshanayata balapamak athi kirima, gewaththa ha gruhashritha nishpadana walata yomu kirima ha welandapalata yomuwima walakwima, gruhaya aashrithawa bhu sampath prachalitha kirima aadiya we.awata parisarayen labagatha haki sampath nothaka harima nisa aarthika ha poshana gatalu udgathawima saha awama wiyadamakin pahasuwen sapaya gatha hakide adhika mila ganan yatathe weෙlandasalen labaganimata huruwima aadiya pilibandawa danuwath karamin gruha aarthika eekaka sakas kerethi.dilindukamin thora shri lankawak nirmanaya kirime diwinanguma wadasatahana yatathe krushikarma anshayan wishalawerdhanayak labagena thibe.
